attributes.action: have an election to vote a new prime minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think the country should decide who will be the next prime minister,not Tony Blair, it is the democratic way.
Also the new PM or in fact any MP should have a constituency in the area where decisions made in our parliament come into play

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
